user.title: Select energy sensor
user.description: Choose the cumulative energy sensor that resets daily (e.g. today's import).

windows.title: Source name and first window
windows.description: Set the source name (defaults to the sensor name). Add one window: name, start time, end time. You can add more windows later via CONFIGURE.

error.window_start_after_end: Start time must be earlier than end time.
error.at_least_one_window: At least one window is required (start time before end time).

abort.already_configured: This configuration is already set up.

init.title: Edit source and windows
init.description: Row 1 is your first window. The last row is for adding another: enter a name and start/end in HH:MM (e.g. 09:00, 17:00) with start before end. Leave the last row as 00:00 and 00:00 to skip. To remove a window, set its start and end to the same time (e.g. 00:00 and 00:00).

error.window_start_after_end: Start time must be earlier than end time.
error.at_least_one_window: At least one window is required.
